alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:45PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Elko and north central Eureka Counties through 630 PM PDT... At 545 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Montello to 9 miles northwest of Carlin. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elko, Carlin, Wells, South Fork, Ruby Valley, Montello, Oasis, Lamoille, Clover Valley, Deeth, Ryndon, Spring Creek, Pequop Summit, Angel Lake, Adobe Summit, Moor Summit, Secret Pass, Lamoille Summit, North Area Mine and Emigrant Mine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
